snippet: Bureaucratic and technical obstacles have slowed the distribution of federal aid in places where water is laced with nitrates and other pollutants.
abstract: Monson, Calif, is one of numerous places in the country in need of clean tap water that have encountered bureaucratic and technical obstacles in getting federal funds under Safe Drinking Water Act; no state has been more inept in distributing money that Environmental Protection Agency has given to state agencies as California.
lead_paragraph: Bureaucratic and technical obstacles have slowed the distribution of federal aid in places where water is laced with nitrates and other pollutants.

headline.seo: Safe Drinking Water Elusive for Many in California
headline.main: Why Federal Efforts to Ensure Clean Tap Water Fail to Reach Faucets Nationwide
headline.print_headline: Why Federal Efforts to Ensure Clean Tap Water Fail to Reach Faucets Nationwide
